0Dgj-41uefE.title: How to do External Linking in WordPress (Step-by-step) | Edu4Sure
0Dgj-41uefE.author: Edu4Sure
0Dgj-41uefE.description:
This video has a Complete step-by-step process to explain How to do External Linking in WordPress? We took some examples where we showed how to connect naturally (using Anchor Text).

External linking is an important factor of On-page SEO.  

Edu4Sure is the only company which delivered a 100-hour course on Digital Marketing for SSCBS, Delhi University for 3 years. With the help of live projects, one can easily learn and grow the business.
